item.title: MIUI OS2.0.203.0.VMICNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 3 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 3 China

Codename: yuechu

Version: OS2.0.203.0.VMICNXM | 15.0

Size: 8.6 GB

MD5: 930af6267299f2d3747107b9d61fbc5b

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: Animation effects when launching apps
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock now supports new animations
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Optimization: Custom notifications now support unfolding
[Accessibility]
Fix: Touch gestures stopped working in TalkBack mode
Fix: Volume buttons didn't work in TalkBack mode
Fix: Issues that prevented Recorder from capturing TalkBack audio
Fix: Issues with announcements for unselected items in Calendar and other apps
Fix: Some buttons weren't announced in several apps, including Settings, Control center, Messaging, Contacts, Weather, Notes, and Browser
More accessibility fixes are available in Xiaomi Community

Download: Here
